Html:
I get the follwing error when building the App (VS2008)

Could not load type 'NerdDinner.MvcApplication'.

Me too ... also using VS2008 (Pro) / NET 3.5

This applies to the current (and unmodified) demo source code.

_______________________________________________________________________________________________________

Parser Error Message: Could not load type 'NerdDinner.MvcApplication'.

Source Error: 

Line 1:  <%@ Application Codebehind="Global.asax.cs" Inherits="NerdDinner.MvcApplication" Language="C#" %>


Source File: /global.asax    Line: 1

________________________________________________________________________________________________________

Any thoughts?

For me it started happening with a modified project all of a sudden. It was just after a windows update on August 25th - don't know if that's a coincidence.

Also happens with the original source code sometimes now as well.
I have the same problem! This error is really annoying, plz help!!
